name: ChatGPT
description: AI chatbot for writing, brainstorming, coding, and research powered by GPT-4.
summary: OpenAI's flagship AI chatbot powered by GPT-4o. Handles writing, coding, analysis, and creative tasks through natural conversation. The most widely used AI tool globally.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Plus $20/mo. Team $25/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Jasper
description: AI content platform for marketing teams to create on-brand copy at scale.
summary: AI content platform built for marketing teams to produce on-brand copy at scale. Offers templates for ads, blogs, emails, and social media. Integrates brand voice and style guidelines.
pricingDetails: Creator $49/mo. Pro $69/mo. Business custom pricing.

name: Copy.ai
description: AI-powered copywriting tool for generating marketing copy, emails, and social posts.
summary: AI-powered copywriting platform for generating marketing copy, emails, and social posts. Uses workflows to automate repetitive content tasks. Popular with small businesses and agencies.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 2,000 words/mo. Pro $49/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Grammarly
description: AI writing assistant that checks grammar, clarity, tone, and style in real time.
summary: AI writing assistant that checks grammar, clarity, tone, and style in real time across platforms. Works as a browser extension, desktop app, and keyboard. Trusted by over 30 million users daily.
pricingDetails: Free basic plan. Premium $12/mo. Business $15/member/mo.

name: Writesonic
description: AI writer for SEO-optimized blog posts, ads, and product descriptions.
summary: AI writing platform for creating SEO-optimized blog posts, ads, and product descriptions. Includes Chatsonic, an AI chatbot with real-time web access. Supports multiple content formats.
pricingDetails: Free trial available. Individual $16/mo. Team $13/user/mo.

name: Rytr
description: Affordable AI writing assistant supporting 30+ languages and 20+ tones.
summary: Affordable AI writing assistant supporting 30+ languages and 20+ tones of voice. Generates blog posts, emails, ads, and social content. Great for freelancers and small teams on a budget.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 10k chars/mo. Saver $9/mo. Unlimited $29/mo.

name: Midjourney
description: AI image generator creating stunning artwork from text prompts via Discord.
summary: Leading AI image generator creating stunning artwork from text prompts via Discord. Known for exceptional artistic quality and aesthetic style. Widely used by designers, artists, and creative professionals.
pricingDetails: Basic $10/mo. Standard $30/mo. Pro $60/mo. Mega $120/mo.

name: DALL·E
description: OpenAI’s image generation model creating photorealistic images from text descriptions.
summary: OpenAI's image generation model creating photorealistic and artistic images from text descriptions. Integrated into ChatGPT and available via API. Excels at following complex prompts accurately.
pricingDetails: Included in ChatGPT Plus ($20/mo). API usage-based pricing per image.

name: Canva AI
description: Design platform with AI tools for generating images, removing backgrounds, and Magic Write.
summary: All-in-one design platform with AI-powered tools for image generation, background removal, and Magic Write. Used by over 170 million people for presentations, social media, and marketing materials.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $13/mo. Teams $10/user/mo.

name: Adobe Firefly
description: Adobe’s generative AI for creating images, text effects, and vector graphics.
summary: Adobe's generative AI engine for creating images, text effects, and vector graphics. Trained on licensed content for commercial safety. Integrated across Creative Cloud apps like Photoshop and Illustrator.
pricingDetails: Free tier with 25 credits/mo. Premium plan $10/mo. Included in CC subscriptions.

name: Figma AI
description: Collaborative design tool with AI features for auto-layout, prototyping, and content generation.
summary: Industry-standard collaborative design tool with AI features for auto-layout, prototyping, and content generation. Used by product teams for UI/UX design. Recently added AI-powered design suggestions.
pricingDetails: Free for individuals. Professional $15/editor/mo. Organization $45/editor/mo.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and entire functions in your editor.
summary: AI pair programmer by GitHub and OpenAI that suggests code completions and entire functions in your editor. Supports all major languages and IDEs. The most widely adopted AI coding assistant.
pricingDetails: Free for students/OSS. Individual $10/mo. Business $19/user/mo. Enterprise $39/user/mo.

name: Cursor
description: AI-first code editor built on VS Code with intelligent autocomplete and chat.
summary: AI-first code editor built on VS Code with intelligent autocomplete, multi-file editing, and codebase-aware chat. Rapidly growing among developers for its deep AI integration. Supports multiple AI models.
pricingDetails: Free hobby tier. Pro $20/mo. Business $40/user/mo.

name: Replit AI
description: Cloud IDE with AI coding assistant for generating, debugging, and explaining code.
summary: Cloud IDE with built-in AI coding assistant for generating, debugging, and explaining code. Enables building and deploying apps entirely in the browser. Great for learning and rapid prototyping.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Replit Core $25/mo. Teams custom pricing.

name: Tabnine
description: AI code completion tool that runs locally or in the cloud, supporting 30+ languages.
summary: AI code completion tool that runs locally or in the cloud, supporting 30+ languages. Focuses on privacy with on-premise deployment options. Personalizes to your codebase and style.
pricingDetails: Free basic plan. Pro $12/user/mo. Enterprise custom pricing.

name: Codeium
description: Free AI code completion and chat supporting 70+ languages and 40+ editors.
summary: Free AI code completion and chat tool supporting 70+ languages and 40+ editors. Offers fast, high-quality suggestions without cost. Enterprise version adds codebase-aware features.
pricingDetails: Free for individuals. Teams $15/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: HubSpot AI
description: AI tools built into HubSpot CRM for content creation, forecasting, and customer insights.
summary: AI tools integrated into HubSpot's CRM platform for content creation, email writing, forecasting, and customer insights. Automates marketing, sales, and service workflows. Used by 200,000+ businesses.
features: AI content writer for blogs and emails
pricingDetails: Free CRM with basic AI. Starter $20/mo. Professional $890/mo. Enterprise $3,600/mo.

name: Surfer SEO
description: AI-driven SEO tool for content optimization, keyword research, and SERP analysis.
summary: AI-driven SEO tool for optimizing content to rank higher in search results. Analyzes top-ranking pages and provides real-time content scoring. Integrates with popular writing tools.
pricingDetails: Essential $89/mo. Scale $129/mo. Scale AI $219/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Semrush
description: All-in-one marketing toolkit with AI-powered SEO, PPC, and competitive analysis.
summary: All-in-one digital marketing toolkit with AI-powered SEO, PPC, content marketing, and competitive analysis. Trusted by 10M+ marketers worldwide. Comprehensive database of keywords and backlinks.
pricingDetails: Pro $130/mo. Guru $250/mo. Business $500/mo.

name: Mailchimp AI
description: Email marketing platform with AI for content generation, send-time optimization, and segmentation.
summary: Email marketing platform with AI tools for content generation, send-time optimization, and audience segmentation. Part of Intuit. Serves millions of small businesses for email campaigns.
pricingDetails: Free plan up to 500 contacts. Essentials $13/mo. Standard $20/mo. Premium $350/mo.

name: Runway
description: AI creative suite for video generation, editing, and visual effects using Gen-3.
summary: AI creative suite for video generation and editing using Gen-3 Alpha model. Creates realistic video clips from text and images. Used by filmmakers and content creators for visual effects.
pricingDetails: Free tier with limited credits. Standard $15/mo. Pro $35/mo. Unlimited $95/mo.

name: Synthesia
description: AI video platform creating professional videos with realistic avatars from text scripts.
summary: AI video platform for creating professional videos with realistic digital avatars from text scripts. No cameras or actors needed. Widely used for corporate training, onboarding, and marketing.
pricingDetails: Starter $22/mo. Creator $67/mo. Enterprise custom pricing.

name: Descript
description: AI-powered video and podcast editor with transcription, filler word removal, and eye contact correction.
summary: AI-powered video and podcast editor where you edit media by editing text. Features automatic transcription, filler word removal, and eye contact correction. Intuitive for non-technical editors.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Hobbyist $24/mo. Pro $33/mo.

name: HeyGen
description: AI video generator with customizable avatars for marketing, training, and sales videos.
summary: AI video generator with customizable digital avatars for marketing, training, and sales videos. Supports video translation into 40+ languages with lip sync. Fast growing in enterprise adoption.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 1 credit. Creator $29/mo. Business $89/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Pika
description: AI video generation platform turning text and images into cinematic video clips.
summary: AI video generation platform turning text and images into cinematic video clips. Known for creative and artistic video outputs. Offers intuitive editing tools for modifying generated videos.
pricingDetails: Free tier with daily credits. Standard $10/mo. Pro $35/mo. Unlimited $70/mo.

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI voice synthesis platform with ultra-realistic text-to-speech and voice cloning.
summary: Leading AI voice synthesis platform with ultra-realistic text-to-speech and voice cloning capabilities. Supports 29 languages with natural-sounding output. Used for audiobooks, dubbing, and content creation.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Starter $5/mo. Creator $22/mo. Pro $99/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Murf
description: AI voice generator with 120+ voices for voiceovers, e-learning, and presentations.
summary: AI voice generator with 120+ realistic voices for voiceovers, e-learning, and presentations. Offers studio-quality output with voice customization. Simple interface for non-technical users.
pricingDetails: Free trial available. Creator $29/mo. Business $79/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Soundraw
description: AI music generator creating royalty-free tracks customized by mood, genre, and length.
summary: AI music generator creating royalty-free tracks customized by mood, genre, and length. Generates unique compositions that can be edited and customized. Ideal for video creators and content producers.
pricingDetails: Starter $17/mo. Pro $33/mo. Unlimited $49/mo.

name: AIVA
description: AI music composition assistant creating emotional soundtracks for videos, games, and ads.
summary: AI music composition assistant creating emotional soundtracks for videos, games, and ads. Composes in 250+ styles from classical to electronic. Recognized as a virtual composer by SACEM.
pricingDetails: Free plan (limited). Standard $15/mo. Pro $49/mo.

name: Notion AI
description: AI assistant built into Notion for writing, summarizing, brainstorming, and autofilling databases.
summary: AI assistant built into Notion for writing, summarizing, brainstorming, and autofilling databases. Deeply integrated with your workspace for context-aware responses. Enhances productivity across notes, docs, and projects.
pricingDetails: Notion AI add-on $10/member/mo on top of Notion plan.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes meetings in real time.
summary: AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes meetings in real time. Integrates with Zoom, Google Meet, and Teams. Generates action items and lets you search across all conversations.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 300 min/mo. Pro $17/mo. Business $40/user/mo.

name: Reclaim AI
description: AI scheduling tool that automatically finds the best time for tasks, habits, and meetings.
summary: AI scheduling tool that automatically finds the best time for tasks, habits, and meetings. Syncs with Google Calendar to protect focus time. Helps teams coordinate without scheduling conflicts.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Starter $10/user/mo. Business $15/user/mo.

name: Motion
description: AI-powered calendar and project manager that auto-schedules tasks and prioritizes your day.
summary: AI-powered calendar and project manager that auto-schedules tasks and prioritizes your day. Dynamically reorganizes your schedule as priorities change. Combines task management with intelligent time blocking.
pricingDetails: Individual $34/mo. Team $12/user/mo.

name: Mem
description: AI-powered note-taking app that self-organizes and surfaces relevant information.
summary: AI-powered note-taking app that self-organizes and surfaces relevant information automatically. Uses AI to connect related notes and find answers from your knowledge base. No manual folder organization needed.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Mem Plus $15/mo. Teams $20/user/mo.

name: Julius AI
description: AI data analyst that interprets spreadsheets, creates visualizations, and answers data questions.
summary: AI data analyst that interprets spreadsheets, creates visualizations, and answers data questions in plain language. Upload CSV, Excel, or connect databases. Makes data analysis accessible to non-technical users.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Essential $20/mo. Pro $50/mo.

name: Obviously AI
description: No-code AI platform for building predictive models from your data in minutes.
summary: No-code AI platform for building predictive models from your data in minutes. Automates machine learning pipeline from data to predictions. Designed for business analysts without ML expertise.
pricingDetails: Growth $75/mo. Enterprise custom pricing.

name: MonkeyLearn
description: No-code text analytics platform for sentiment analysis, classification, and extraction.
summary: No-code text analytics platform for sentiment analysis, classification, and data extraction. Pre-built and custom models for analyzing customer feedback. Integrates with popular business tools.
pricingDetails: Team $299/mo. Business $500/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Claude
description: Anthropic’s AI assistant excelling at analysis, coding, math, and long-document reasoning.
summary: Anthropic's AI assistant excelling at analysis, coding, math, and long-document reasoning. Known for thoughtful, nuanced responses and strong safety alignment. Supports 200K token context windows.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Pro $20/mo. Team $25/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Perplexity
description: AI-powered search engine delivering cited, real-time answers from across the web.
summary: AI-powered search engine delivering cited, real-time answers from across the web. Combines large language models with live web search for accurate, sourced responses. Growing alternative to traditional search.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $20/mo with GPT-4 and Claude access.

name: Gemini
description: Google’s multimodal AI assistant for writing, research, coding, and image understanding.
summary: Google's multimodal AI assistant for writing, research, coding, and image understanding. Integrated with Google Workspace, Search, and Android. Powered by Gemini 1.5 Pro with 1M token context.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Gemini Advanced $20/mo with Google One AI Premium.

name: Sora
description: OpenAI’s text-to-video model generating realistic cinematic clips from prompts.
summary: OpenAI's text-to-video model generating realistic cinematic clips from text prompts. Produces up to 60-second videos with consistent characters and physics. Available through ChatGPT Pro subscription.
pricingDetails: Included in ChatGPT Plus ($20/mo) with limits. Unlimited in Pro ($200/mo).

name: Flux
description: Open-source image generation model rivaling Midjourney with fast, high-quality outputs.
summary: Open-source image generation model by Black Forest Labs rivaling Midjourney with fast, high-quality outputs. Available in multiple variants from fast to ultra-detailed. Widely adopted in the open-source AI community.
pricingDetails: Free and open-source. Pro API available through Black Forest Labs.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source AI image generator with full local control and extensive community models.
summary: Open-source AI image generator by Stability AI with full local control and extensive community models. Offers complete customization through fine-tuning and LoRA. The foundation for thousands of community models.
pricingDetails: Free and open-source. Stability AI API from $0.01/image. DreamStudio credits available.

name: Leonardo AI
description: AI art platform with fine-tuned models for game assets, concept art, and illustrations.
summary: AI art platform with fine-tuned models for game assets, concept art, and illustrations. Offers model training and real-time canvas generation. Popular with game developers and digital artists.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 150 tokens/day. Apprentice $12/mo. Artisan $30/mo. Maestro $60/mo.

name: v0
description: Vercel’s AI tool that generates production-ready React UI components from text prompts.
summary: Vercel's AI tool that generates production-ready React UI components from text prompts and images. Creates clean, responsive code using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS. Ideal for rapid frontend prototyping.
pricingDetails: Free tier with limited generations. Premium $20/mo.

name: Bolt
description: AI full-stack app builder that generates, runs, and deploys web apps in the browser.
summary: AI full-stack app builder by StackBlitz that generates, runs, and deploys web apps directly in the browser. Creates complete applications from natural language descriptions. Supports multiple frameworks.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Pro $20/mo. Team $40/user/mo.

name: Lovable
description: AI software engineer that builds full-stack web applications from natural language descriptions.
summary: AI software engineer that builds full-stack web applications from natural language descriptions. Generates complete apps with frontend, backend, and database. Formerly known as GPT Engineer.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Starter $20/mo. Launch $50/mo. Scale $100/mo.

name: Windsurf
description: AI-powered code editor with deep codebase understanding and multi-file editing capabilities.
summary: AI-powered code editor by Codeium with deep codebase understanding and multi-file editing capabilities. Features Cascade, an agentic AI that can reason across your entire project. Built on VS Code foundation.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Pro $15/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Devin
description: Autonomous AI software engineer that plans, codes, debugs, and deploys end-to-end.
summary: Autonomous AI software engineer by Cognition Labs that plans, codes, debugs, and deploys end-to-end. Works independently on complex engineering tasks in its own development environment. First AI software engineer.
pricingDetails: Enterprise pricing at $500/mo per seat.

name: Gamma
description: AI presentation maker that generates beautiful slide decks and documents from prompts.
summary: AI presentation maker that generates beautiful slide decks, documents, and web pages from prompts. Creates visually polished content in seconds. No design skills required.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 400 credits. Plus $10/mo. Pro $20/mo.

name: Tome
description: AI-powered storytelling tool that creates polished presentations and narratives instantly.
summary: AI-powered storytelling and presentation tool that creates polished narratives and decks instantly. Designed for sales, marketing, and executive communications. Combines AI generation with rich media.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Professional $16/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Beautiful.ai
description: AI presentation software with smart templates that auto-adapt layout as you add content.
summary: AI presentation software with smart templates that auto-adapt layout as you add content. Ensures professional design without manual formatting. Great for teams needing consistent branded decks.
pricingDetails: Pro $12/mo. Team $40/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Luma AI
description: AI platform for creating photorealistic 3D models and videos from text or images.
summary: AI platform for creating photorealistic 3D models and videos from text or images. Dream Machine generates high-quality video clips. Also offers 3D capture via NeRF technology from phone scans.
pricingDetails: Free tier with 30 generations/mo. Standard $30/mo. Pro $100/mo.

name: Kling AI
description: AI video generation model producing high-quality cinematic clips with realistic motion.
summary: AI video generation model by Kuaishou producing high-quality cinematic clips with realistic motion. Supports text-to-video and image-to-video with impressive consistency. Competitive with Sora and Runway.
pricingDetails: Free tier with daily credits. Standard $5.99/mo. Pro $21.99/mo. Premier $53.99/mo.

name: Suno
description: AI music generator that creates full songs with vocals, lyrics, and instrumentals from prompts.
summary: AI music generator that creates full songs with vocals, lyrics, and instrumentals from text prompts. Produces remarkably realistic music across genres. One of the most impressive generative audio tools available.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 10 songs/day. Pro $10/mo. Premier $30/mo.

name: Udio
description: AI music creation platform generating studio-quality songs across any genre from text.
summary: AI music creation platform generating studio-quality songs across any genre from text descriptions. Produces realistic vocals and instrumentals. Direct competitor to Suno with emphasis on audio quality.
pricingDetails: Free tier with 10 generations/day. Standard $10/mo. Pro $30/mo.

name: Zapier AI
description: AI-powered automation platform connecting 6,000+ apps with natural language workflows.
summary: AI-powered automation platform connecting 7,000+ apps with natural language workflows. Build complex automations by describing what you want in plain English. The most popular no-code automation tool.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 100 tasks/mo. Starter $20/mo. Professional $49/mo. Team $69/mo.

name: Make
description: Visual automation platform with AI integrations for building complex workflows without code.
summary: Visual automation platform with AI integrations for building complex workflows without code. Offers a drag-and-drop builder with branching logic and error handling. More powerful than Zapier for complex scenarios.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 1,000 ops/mo. Core $9/mo. Pro $16/mo. Teams $29/mo.

name: Bardeen
description: AI automation tool that scrapes data, automates repetitive tasks, and connects apps.
summary: AI automation tool that scrapes data, automates repetitive tasks, and connects apps via browser extension. Works directly in your browser for web-based workflows. Specializes in scraping and data entry automation.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Professional $10/mo. Business $15/user/mo.

name: Fireflies.ai
description: AI meeting notetaker that transcribes, summarizes, and searches across all your meetings.
summary: AI meeting notetaker that transcribes, summarizes, and searches across all your meetings. Integrates with major video conferencing platforms. Creates searchable knowledge base from conversations.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $18/user/mo. Business $29/user/mo. Enterprise $39/user/mo.

name: Krisp
description: AI noise cancellation app that removes background noise and provides meeting transcription.
summary: AI noise cancellation app that removes background noise from calls and provides meeting transcription. Works with any conferencing app. Processes audio locally for privacy.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 60 min/day. Pro $8/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: tl;dv
description: AI meeting recorder for Google Meet and Zoom with timestamped transcripts and summaries.
summary: AI meeting recorder for Google Meet, Zoom, and Teams with timestamped transcripts and summaries. Lets you clip and share key meeting moments. Integrates with CRM and project management tools.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $25/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Photoroom
description: AI photo editor that removes backgrounds and creates professional product images instantly.
summary: AI photo editor specializing in background removal and professional product photography. Creates studio-quality product images instantly. Popular with e-commerce sellers and marketers.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $13/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Remove.bg
description: AI tool that removes image backgrounds automatically in seconds with one click.
summary: AI tool that removes image backgrounds automatically in seconds with one click. Produces clean cutouts for any image type. Available as web tool, API, and desktop app.
pricingDetails: Free low-res previews. Pay-as-you-go from $0.90/image. Subscription from $9/mo.

name: Clipdrop
description: AI-powered image editing suite for background removal, relighting, upscaling, and generation.
summary: AI-powered image editing suite by Stability AI for background removal, relighting, upscaling, and generation. Offers multiple specialized AI tools in one platform. Fast and easy to use for quick edits.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Pro $9/mo.

name: Wordtune
description: AI writing companion that rephrases sentences, adjusts tone, and improves clarity.
summary: AI writing companion that rephrases sentences, adjusts tone, and improves clarity. Helps rewrite content while preserving meaning. Offers summarization of long documents and YouTube videos.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 10 rewrites/day. Plus $10/mo. Unlimited $15/mo.

name: QuillBot
description: AI paraphrasing and summarizing tool with grammar checking and citation generation.
summary: AI paraphrasing and summarizing tool with grammar checking and citation generation. Offers multiple rewriting modes from formal to creative. Popular with students and academic writers.
pricingDetails: Free basic plan. Premium $10/mo.

name: Ahrefs
description: SEO toolset with AI-powered content explorer, keyword research, and backlink analysis.
summary: Comprehensive SEO toolset with AI-powered content explorer, keyword research, and the largest backlink database. Industry standard for competitive SEO analysis. Trusted by major brands and agencies.
pricingDetails: Lite $129/mo. Standard $249/mo. Advanced $449/mo. Enterprise $14,990/yr.

name: Moz
description: SEO platform with AI-driven keyword research, site audits, and domain authority tracking.
summary: SEO platform with AI-driven keyword research, site audits, and the original Domain Authority metric. Offers beginner-friendly interface with powerful features. Strong community and learning resources.
pricingDetails: Starter $49/mo. Standard $99/mo. Medium $179/mo. Large $299/mo.

name: Loom AI
description: Async video messaging platform with AI summaries, chapters, and auto-generated titles.
summary: Async video messaging platform with AI-powered summaries, chapters, and auto-generated titles. Record screen and camera to share quick updates. Part of Atlassian, integrated with Jira and Confluence.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 25 videos. Business $15/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Riverside
description: AI-powered recording studio for podcasts and video with local HD and transcription.
summary: AI-powered recording studio for podcasts and video with local HD quality up to 4K. Records each participant locally to avoid quality loss. Includes AI transcription and clip generation.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 1 hour recording. Standard $15/mo. Pro $24/mo.

name: Opus Clip
description: AI tool that turns long videos into viral short clips with automatic captions.
summary: AI tool that turns long videos into viral short clips with automatic captions and virality scoring. Identifies the most engaging moments automatically. Optimized for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts.
features: AI clip selection from long videos
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Starter $19/mo. Pro $49/mo.

name: Mistral AI
description: Open-weight AI models offering fast, efficient language understanding and generation.
summary: French AI company offering open-weight language models for fast, efficient text generation. Models range from small (7B) to large (Mixtral). Strong focus on European AI sovereignty and open-source.
pricingDetails: Free Le Chat access. API usage-based pricing. Enterprise self-hosting available.

name: Cohere
description: Enterprise AI platform for text generation, search, and classification at scale.
summary: Enterprise AI platform for text generation, semantic search, and classification at scale. Specializes in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for businesses. Offers private cloud deployment options.
pricingDetails: Free trial available. Production usage-based pricing. Enterprise custom.

name: Ideogram
description: AI image generator specializing in accurate text rendering within generated artwork.
summary: AI image generator specializing in accurate text rendering within generated artwork. One of the few models that reliably generates readable text in images. Also produces high-quality artistic images.
pricingDetails: Free tier with daily credits. Basic $8/mo. Plus $20/mo. Pro $60/mo.

name: Krea AI
description: Real-time AI image generation and enhancement tool with creative upscaling features.
summary: Real-time AI image generation and enhancement tool with creative upscaling features. Generates images as you draw or type with instant preview. Offers unique real-time canvas for interactive creation.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Pro $30/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Framer AI
description: AI website builder that generates and publishes responsive sites from text descriptions.
summary: AI website builder that generates and publishes responsive sites from text descriptions. Creates production-ready websites with animations and interactions. No coding required for professional results.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Mini $5/mo. Basic $15/mo. Pro $30/mo.

name: Wix AI
description: AI website builder creating fully designed, customizable sites from a brief description.
summary: AI website builder creating fully designed, customizable sites from a brief description. Part of the Wix platform serving 250M+ users. Includes AI text and image generation tools.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Light $17/mo. Core $29/mo. Business $36/mo.

name: Vercel AI SDK
description: Open-source TypeScript toolkit for building AI-powered applications and chatbots.
summary: Open-source TypeScript toolkit for building AI-powered applications and chatbots. Provides streaming, tool calling, and model-agnostic abstractions. The standard for building AI apps in the JavaScript ecosystem.
pricingDetails: Free and open-source. Vercel hosting plans start at $20/mo.

name: Amazon CodeWhisperer
description: Amazon’s AI code companion for real-time suggestions and security scanning.
summary: Amazon's AI code companion (now Amazon Q Developer) for real-time code suggestions and security scanning. Optimized for AWS development. Scans code for vulnerabilities and suggests fixes.
pricingDetails: Free individual tier. Professional $19/user/mo.

name: Podcast AI by Adobe
description: AI-powered audio recording and editing tool with noise removal and transcription.
summary: AI-powered audio recording and editing tool by Adobe with studio-quality noise removal and transcription. Enhance Audio feature makes any recording sound professional. Free to use in beta.
pricingDetails: Free during beta. Future pricing TBD.

name: Speechify
description: AI text-to-speech reader that converts documents, articles, and PDFs into natural audio.
summary: AI text-to-speech reader that converts documents, articles, and PDFs into natural-sounding audio. Available as browser extension, mobile app, and desktop app. Popular for accessibility and productivity.
pricingDetails: Free basic plan. Premium $139/yr. Audiobook plan available.

name: Resemble AI
description: AI voice cloning platform for creating custom synthetic voices for any application.
summary: AI voice cloning platform for creating custom synthetic voices for any application. Offers real-time voice conversion and speech-to-speech. Used for gaming, media, and enterprise applications.
pricingDetails: Pay-as-you-go from $0.006/sec. Enterprise plans available.

name: Descript Podcast
description: AI podcast editor with text-based editing, filler word removal, and studio sound.
summary: AI podcast editor with text-based editing, automatic transcription, and studio sound enhancement. Edit audio by editing the transcript. Removes filler words and generates show notes automatically.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Hobbyist $24/mo. Pro $33/mo.

name: Pictory
description: AI video creator that turns blog posts and scripts into short branded videos.
summary: AI video creator that turns blog posts and scripts into short branded videos automatically. Extracts key content and pairs with stock footage. Ideal for content repurposing and social media.
pricingDetails: Starter $19/mo. Professional $39/mo. Teams $99/mo.

name: InVideo AI
description: AI video maker that generates publish-ready videos from text prompts in minutes.
summary: AI video maker that generates publish-ready videos from text prompts in minutes. Creates complete videos with footage, music, and voiceover. Supports 50+ languages for global content creation.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Plus $25/mo. Max $60/mo.

name: Captions
description: AI-powered video editor with auto-captions, eye contact correction, and AI avatars.
summary: AI-powered video editor with auto-captions, eye contact correction, and AI avatars. Designed for creators making content for social media. Features AI-powered editing tools for polished output.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $10/mo. Business $25/mo.

name: Lately AI
description: AI social media tool that repurposes long-form content into optimized social posts.
summary: AI social media tool that repurposes long-form content into dozens of optimized social posts. Learns your brand voice from historical performance data. Designed for enterprise social media management.
pricingDetails: Starter $49/mo. Pro $119/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Predis.ai
description: AI social media content generator creating posts, carousels, and videos from text.
summary: AI social media content generator creating posts, carousels, and short videos from text input. Offers complete social media management with scheduling. Generates platform-specific content automatically.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Starter $32/mo. Growth $59/mo.

name: AdCreative.ai
description: AI ad creative generator producing high-converting banners and social ad designs.
summary: AI ad creative generator producing high-converting banners and social ad designs. Uses performance data to predict ad effectiveness. Generates hundreds of ad variations in minutes.
pricingDetails: Starter $29/mo. Professional $189/mo. Ultimate $449/mo.

name: Seventh Sense
description: AI email delivery optimization for HubSpot and Marketo using send-time personalization.
summary: AI email delivery optimization for HubSpot and Marketo using personalized send-time algorithms. Determines the optimal time to send emails to each individual contact. Improves open and click rates.
pricingDetails: HubSpot plans from $80/mo. Marketo plans from $450/mo.

name: Brandwatch
description: AI-powered social listening and consumer intelligence platform for brand monitoring.
summary: AI-powered social listening and consumer intelligence platform for brand monitoring at scale. Analyzes online conversations across social media, news, and forums. Part of Cision.
pricingDetails: Enterprise pricing on request. Typically starts at $800+/mo.

name: Tidio AI
description: AI chatbot and live chat platform for e-commerce customer support automation.
summary: AI chatbot and live chat platform for e-commerce customer support automation. Lyro AI agent resolves up to 70% of customer queries automatically. Easy setup with Shopify and WordPress.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Starter $29/mo. Growth $59/mo. Tidio+ $749/mo.

name: Intercom Fin
description: AI customer service agent that resolves support queries using your knowledge base.
summary: AI customer service agent by Intercom that resolves support queries using your knowledge base. Provides accurate, cited answers and handles complex conversations. Seamlessly escalates to human agents.
pricingDetails: Fin AI agent $0.99/resolution. Intercom plans from $39/seat/mo.

name: Rows AI
description: AI-powered spreadsheet that analyzes data, generates formulas, and creates summaries.
summary: AI-powered spreadsheet that analyzes data, generates formulas, and creates summaries. Chat with your data using natural language. Combines spreadsheet functionality with AI intelligence.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $9/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Akkio
description: No-code AI analytics platform for predictive modeling, forecasting, and data chat.
summary: No-code AI analytics platform for predictive modeling, forecasting, and conversational data analysis. Designed for agencies and SMBs. Deploy ML models without technical expertise.
pricingDetails: Starter $49/mo. Professional $99/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Databricks AI
description: Unified data and AI platform for building and deploying machine learning at scale.
summary: Unified data and AI platform for building, training, and deploying machine learning models at scale. Combines data lakehouse architecture with MLOps. Industry leader for enterprise data and AI.
pricingDetails: Pay-as-you-go pricing. Enterprise agreements available. Free community edition.

name: Tableau AI
description: AI-powered data visualization platform with natural language queries and smart analytics.
summary: AI-powered data visualization platform by Salesforce with natural language queries and smart analytics. Industry standard for business intelligence dashboards. Now includes Tableau Pulse AI insights.
pricingDetails: Viewer $15/user/mo. Explorer $42/user/mo. Creator $75/user/mo.

name: ThoughtSpot
description: AI-driven analytics platform enabling natural language search across your business data.
summary: AI-driven analytics platform enabling natural language search across your business data. Delivers instant insights through a Google-like search interface. ThoughtSpot Sage adds generative AI capabilities.
pricingDetails: Essentials from $1,250/mo. Pro and Enterprise custom pricing.

name: Polymer
description: AI data exploration tool that turns spreadsheets into interactive dashboards automatically.
summary: AI data exploration tool that turns spreadsheets into interactive dashboards and presentations automatically. No SQL or coding needed. Creates visualizations from uploaded data files.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Starter $10/mo. Pro $20/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Hex
description: Collaborative data workspace with AI-assisted SQL, Python, and visualization tools.
summary: Collaborative data workspace with AI-assisted SQL, Python, and visualization tools. Combines notebook-style analysis with AI code generation. Used by data teams for analytics and reporting.
pricingDetails: Free community plan. Professional $25/user/mo. Team $50/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Pecan AI
description: Predictive analytics platform using AI to forecast business outcomes from raw data.
summary: Predictive analytics platform using AI to forecast business outcomes from raw data. Automates the entire ML pipeline from data prep to prediction. Focused on marketing and revenue forecasting.
pricingDetails: Enterprise pricing on request. Custom plans based on data volume.

name: Textio
description: AI writing platform that optimizes job postings and business communications for inclusion.
summary: AI writing platform that optimizes job postings and business communications for inclusion and effectiveness. Identifies biased language and suggests alternatives. Used by HR and recruiting teams.
pricingDetails: Enterprise pricing on request. Per-seat licensing.

name: Kickresume
description: AI resume and cover letter builder with professional templates and content suggestions.
summary: AI resume and cover letter builder with professional templates and AI-powered content suggestions. Creates ATS-friendly resumes with one click. Includes website builder for online portfolios.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Premium $19/mo. Lifetime $70 one-time.

name: Teal
description: AI-powered job search platform with resume building, tracking, and matching tools.
summary: AI-powered job search platform with resume building, application tracking, and job matching. Analyzes job descriptions to tailor your resume. Centralizes the entire job search workflow.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $9/week or $44/mo.

name: Casetext (CoCounsel)
description: AI legal research assistant that reviews documents, finds precedents, and drafts memos.
summary: AI legal research assistant by Thomson Reuters that reviews documents, finds precedents, and drafts memos. CoCounsel AI handles complex legal research tasks. Trusted by thousands of law firms.
pricingDetails: Professional plans from $250/user/mo. Enterprise custom pricing.

name: Harvey AI
description: AI platform for law firms automating contract analysis, research, and legal drafting.
summary: AI platform for elite law firms automating contract analysis, research, and legal drafting. Built specifically for legal work with security and compliance. Used by top global law firms.
pricingDetails: Enterprise-only pricing. Custom per-firm agreements.

name: Eightfold AI
description: AI talent intelligence platform for recruiting, retention, and workforce planning.
summary: AI talent intelligence platform for recruiting, retention, and workforce planning. Uses deep learning to match candidates with roles. Serves Fortune 500 companies for talent management.
pricingDetails: Enterprise pricing on request. Module-based licensing.

name: Lattice AI
description: AI-enhanced people management platform for performance reviews and employee engagement.
summary: AI-enhanced people management platform for performance reviews, employee engagement, and compensation planning. Helps managers write reviews and identify trends. Used by 5,000+ companies.
pricingDetails: Starts at $11/person/mo. Add-on modules available. Enterprise custom.

name: Taskade AI
description: AI-powered workspace for task management, mind maps, and team collaboration with agents.
summary: AI-powered workspace for task management, mind maps, and team collaboration with AI agents. Build custom AI agents to automate workflows. Combines project management with generative AI.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $8/user/mo. Business $16/user/mo.

name: ClickUp AI
description: AI project management assistant that writes tasks, summarizes docs, and generates subtasks.
summary: AI assistant integrated into ClickUp project management for writing tasks, summarizing docs, and generating subtasks. Automates routine project management work. Available across all ClickUp features.
pricingDetails: ClickUp AI add-on $7/member/mo on top of ClickUp plans from $7/user/mo.

name: Superhuman AI
description: AI-powered email client with instant replies, summaries, and smart scheduling.
summary: AI-powered email client designed for speed with instant replies, summaries, and smart scheduling. Processes email 2x faster than competitors. Known for keyboard shortcuts and polished design.
pricingDetails: Starter $25/user/mo. Business $35/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Granola
description: AI notepad for meetings that combines your notes with automatic transcript enrichment.
summary: AI notepad for meetings that combines your personal notes with automatic transcript enrichment. Enhances your rough notes into comprehensive meeting records. Lightweight alternative to full meeting recorders.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $10/mo. Business $19/user/mo.

name: Scribe
description: AI tool that auto-generates step-by-step guides and SOPs from screen recordings.
summary: AI tool that auto-generates step-by-step guides and SOPs from screen recordings. Captures clicks and keystrokes to create documented processes. Perfect for training and knowledge documentation.
pricingDetails: Free basic plan. Pro $29/user/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Napkin AI
description: AI tool that transforms text content into professional diagrams and visual explanations.
summary: AI tool that transforms text content into professional diagrams, charts, and visual explanations. Paste any text and get instant visual representations. Great for turning ideas into shareable graphics.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro plan pricing TBD.

name: Looka
description: AI logo maker and brand kit generator creating professional designs in minutes.
summary: AI logo maker and brand kit generator creating professional designs in minutes. Generates hundreds of logo options based on preferences. Includes full brand kit with business card and social templates.
pricingDetails: Free to design. Basic Logo $20 one-time. Brand Kit $96/yr.

name: Designify
description: AI photo editor that auto-enhances product images with backgrounds and shadow effects.
summary: AI photo editor that auto-enhances product images with backgrounds, shadows, and effects. Batch process product photos for e-commerce. Creates professional-looking images from basic smartphone photos.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Pro $39/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Veed.io
description: AI online video editor with auto-subtitles, background removal, and text-to-video.
summary: AI online video editor with auto-subtitles, background removal, and text-to-video features. Browser-based with no downloads required. Popular for social media content creation.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Basic $18/mo. Pro $30/mo. Business $59/mo.

name: Colossyan
description: AI video creator with diverse avatars for corporate training and internal communications.
summary: AI video creator with diverse avatars optimized for corporate training and internal communications. Offers translation and localization features. Enterprise-focused with compliance and security features.
pricingDetails: Starter $35/mo. Pro $120/mo. Enterprise custom.

name: Jasper Art
description: AI art generator within Jasper creating marketing visuals from text descriptions.
summary: AI art generator within the Jasper platform for creating marketing visuals from text descriptions. Optimized for brand-consistent marketing imagery. Integrated with Jasper's content creation suite.
pricingDetails: Included in Jasper plans. Creator $49/mo. Pro $69/mo.

name: Browse AI
description: AI web scraping tool that extracts and monitors data from any website without code.
summary: AI web scraping tool that extracts and monitors data from any website without code. Set up scrapers by pointing and clicking. Automates data collection with scheduled monitoring.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 50 credits/mo. Starter $49/mo. Professional $99/mo.

name: ChatPDF
description: AI tool that lets you chat with any PDF document to extract answers and summaries.
summary: AI tool that lets you chat with any PDF document to extract answers and summaries. Upload research papers, manuals, or reports and ask questions. Simple, focused interface for document Q&A.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 2 PDFs/day. Plus $5/mo.

name: Consensus
description: AI-powered academic search engine that finds and summarizes scientific research papers.
summary: AI-powered academic search engine that finds and summarizes scientific research papers. Provides evidence-based answers with links to peer-reviewed sources. Designed for researchers and students.
pricingDetails: Free plan available. Premium $10/mo. Enterprise for institutions.

name: Elicit
description: AI research assistant that finds relevant papers, extracts claims, and synthesizes findings.
summary: AI research assistant that finds relevant papers, extracts claims, and synthesizes findings. Automates systematic literature review workflows. Helps researchers save hours on evidence gathering.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 5,000 credits. Plus $10/mo. Teams available.

name: SlidesAI
description: AI Google Slides add-on that generates presentation slides from text input instantly.
summary: AI Google Slides add-on that generates presentation slides from text input instantly. Creates themed, formatted slides from pasted text or topics. Simple tool for quick presentations.
pricingDetails: Free plan with 3 presentations/mo. Pro $10/mo.

name: NotebookLM
description: Google’s AI research assistant that summarizes documents and generates audio overviews from your sources.
summary: Google's AI research assistant that grounds responses in your uploaded documents. Generates Audio Overviews (podcast-style discussions) from your sources. Ideal for studying, research, and content synthesis.
pricingDetails: Free to use. NotebookLM Plus for enterprises (pricing TBD).

name: Google Vids
description: Google Workspace AI video creator for presentations, training videos, and team communications.
summary: Google Workspace AI video creator for presentations, training videos, and team communications. Generates video drafts from prompts with stock media. Integrated into Google Workspace ecosystem.
pricingDetails: Included in Gemini for Workspace plans from $14/user/mo.

name: Microsoft Copilot
description: Microsoft’s AI assistant integrated across Windows, Edge, and Microsoft 365 for productivity and creativity.
summary: Microsoft's AI assistant integrated across Windows, Edge, Office 365, and Azure. Powered by GPT-4 with access to web search and Microsoft Graph. The most widely deployed enterprise AI assistant.
pricingDetails: Free web version. Copilot Pro $20/mo. Microsoft 365 Copilot $30/user/mo.

name: Microsoft Designer
description: AI graphic design tool by Microsoft for creating social posts, invitations, and visuals from prompts.
summary: AI graphic design tool by Microsoft for creating social posts, invitations, and visuals from prompts. Powered by DALL-E for image generation. Free to use with a Microsoft account.
pricingDetails: Free with Microsoft account. Premium features in Copilot Pro $20/mo.

name: OpenClaw
description: Open-source AI assistant that lives on your machine — connects to your apps, messages, and workflow. Currently in beta.
summary: OpenClaw is an open-source personal AI agent that runs locally on your computer and connects to your real-world tools — Discord, email, calendar, files, and more. It acts as a persistent co-pilot that remembers context across sessions and can automate tasks proactively. Currently in beta with an active developer community.
features: Connects to Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more
Proactive task automation via heartbeats and cron
pricingDetails: Free and open-source. Requires your own AI API key (e.g. Anthropic, OpenAI).
